actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to transfer a certain parcel of land in Clark County, Nevada.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to transfer specified lands to Clark County, Nevada, for use as a mobile home park for low-income senior citizens. Reserves mineral rights to the United States.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to transfer a certain parcel of land in Clark County, Nevada.
